parent.description: Required. The resource name of the parent lake: projects/{project_id}/locations/{location_id}/lakes/{lake_id}

validateOnly.description: Optional. Only validate the request, but do not perform mutations. The default is false.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

GoogleCloudDataplexV1Content.description: Content represents a user-visible notebook or a sql script

dataText.description: Required. Content data in string format.

labels.description: Optional. User defined labels for the content.

name.description: Output only. The relative resource name of the content, of the form: projects/{project_id}/locations/{location_id}/lakes/{lake_id}/content/{content_id}

path.description: Required. The path for the Content file, represented as directory structure. Unique within a lake. Limited to alphanumerics, hyphens, underscores, dots and slashes.

uid.description: Output only. System generated globally unique ID for the content. This ID will be different if the content is deleted and re-created with the same name.

updateTime.description: Output only. The time when the content was last updated.

kernelType.description: Required. Kernel Type of the notebook.

GoogleCloudDataplexV1ContentSqlScript.description: Configuration for the Sql Script content.

engine.description: Required. Query Engine to be used for the Sql Query.
